user.title: Configure Electricity Price Forecast
user.description: Enter the URL where your Electricity Forecast API is running. Example: http://192.168.1.100:8000 or http://localhost:8000

data_description.api_url: The root URL of your Electricity Forecast API server (without trailing slash). Example: http://192.168.1.100:8000
data_description.region_id: Select the German region for electricity price forecasts

error.cannot_connect:
Failed to connect to the API. Please verify:
• API URL is correct (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:8000)
• API service is running
• Home Assistant can reach the API server
• No firewall blocking port 8000
error.invalid_url: Invalid URL format. Please use format: http://hostname:port
error.no_data: API is reachable but no prediction data is available. Please run the prediction generator first.

abort.already_configured: This API and region combination is already configured.
